SqlMap.select: SELECT TRIM(FLOOR_PLACE_DV) AS FLOOR_PLACE_DV ,FLOOR_PLACE_DV_NM FROM MST_FLOOR_PLACE_DV

INSERT INTO MST_FLOOR_PLACE_DV (FLOOR_PLACE_DV , FLOOR_PLACE_DV_NM , USR_CD , TEL_NO , ADDRESS , CREATE_EMP_NO , CREATE_DT , LAST_UPDATE_EMP_NO , LAST_UPDATE_DT) VALUES (NEXT VALUE FOR LOCATION_DATA_SEQ , #FLOOR_PLACE_DV# , #FLOOR_PLACE_DV_NM# , #USR_CD# , #TEL_NO# , #ADDRESS# , #EMP_NO# , GETDATE() , #EMP_NO# , GETDATE() )

UPDATE MST_FLOOR_PLACE_DV SET FLOOR_PLACE_DV = #FLOOR_PLACE_DV# , FLOOR_PLACE_DV_NM = #FLOOR_PLACE_DV_NM# , USR_CD = #USR_CD# , TEL_NO = #TEL_NO# , ADDRESS = #ADDRESS# , CREATE_EMP_NO = #EMP_NO# , CREATE_DT = GETDATE() , LAST_UPDATE_EMP_NO = #EMP_NO# , LAST_UPDATE_D = GETDATE() where FLOOR_PLACE_DV = #FLOOR_PLACE_DV#
